lyrics.text:
Rejoice, rejoice,
rejoice, give thanks and sing.

Your clear hosannas raise,
and alleluias loud;
whilst answering echoes upward float,
like wreaths of incense cloud.

Rejoice, rejoice,
rejoice, give thanks and sing.

Rejoice, rejoice,
rejoice, give thanks and sing.

Rejoice, rejoice,
rejoice, give thanks and sing.

Praise God who reigns on high,
the Lord whom we adore,
the Father, Son, and Holy Ghost,
one God forevermore.

Rejoice, rejoice,
rejoice, give thanks and sing.
